text: Spy Kids is the first movie of the Spy Kids series. It is directed and written by Robert Rodriguez. The movie stars Alexa Vega and Daryl Sabara and was released in United States theaters on March 30, 2001 and on DVD on September 28, 2001. ==Other websites== * * * Category:2001 movies Category:Multilingual movies Category:Movies directed by Robert Rodriguez Category:Spy Kids
title: Spy Kids
